title: IT Systems Engineer
content:
At Evolve we’re a hardworking team serious about hospitality. Our teams work every day to make vacation rental easy for everyone — from our owners who trust Evolve to build their business to our guests who rest easy with every stay to our Evolvers who make this difference a reality. Our values anchor our daily decisions and interactions with our customers, communities, and each other. Join our inclusive culture in one of the most rapidly-growing segments in travel. Find your home at Evolve.Why this role
Our growing team has become the vacation rental solution for guests, owners, and service partners. We’re redefining the vacation rental experience in tens of thousands of homes across North America — adding more expertise and support for everyone involved. Evolve is more than vacation rentals. Evolve is a better experience.
As an IT Systems Engineer, you’ll report to our VP, Enterprise Systems, partnering with other engineers to accomplish ambitious goals and provide unforgettable technology support to the Evolve team. You will be working with the best in-class technology stack to support the business. You will use your technical knowledge and specialized skills to support, build, implement, and improve technology solutions.   We approach our work with a hospitality mindset and we’re looking for someone who will bring that same mentality to their everyday work. 
What you’ll do

Install, configure, test and maintain operating systems, SaaS application software and system management tools.
Research, design and implement new company wide IT solutions in areas such as Identity and Access Management, Endpoint Management and Security, Collaboration Tools and more.
Ensure the highest levels of system and infrastructure availability based on firmware / security updates and patching.
Monitor and test platforms, applications, and processes for potential bottlenecks, identify solutions, and work with teammates to implement those fixes.
Escalation point for tickets in areas such as user administration, security, and hardware management. Available on call for critical issues.
Use a problem-solving mindset, understanding pain points, and implementing solutions across departments to improve existing processes.
Work closely with the Information Security team to harden the systems, platforms, and devices.
Ensure we are continually up to date and optimized in managing licensing and assets of enterprise technology, partnering with vendors on renewals.

What makes you a great fit 

5+ years of well-rounded IT experience, preferably in a highly cloud-based environment.
Experience with Identity and Access Management, specifically Okta, Azure AD, account. provisioning via SCIM/JIT - creating and managing attributes, passing data, and troubleshooting provisioning issues.
Experience with Zero-trust security and network connectivity.
Demonstrated experience managing a fleet of laptops (Windows and MAC based) and using supporting MDM or UEM solutions (i.e. Intune).
Experience working with powershell - writing scripts, troubleshooting various windows issues, interacting with devices through remote shell to get or set data.
Detailed experience and knowledge around the Windows operating system including working with the registry, services, and file systems.
Experience managing a large user base of 800+ employees.
A passion for technology and customer service and ability to run multiple technical projects at once.
Understanding of and experience in implementing changes related to data security programs that are PCI and industry compliant.
Experience with applications such as GSuite, Microsoft365, Slack, and Zoom.

Location 
We currently are able to hire throughout the U.S except in the following states: District of Columbia, Hawaii, and Pennsylvania. If you live in Colorado, you can work remotely anywhere in the state, at our downtown Denver office, or a hybrid of both!
California Applicant Privacy Policy | Evolve
Compensation
For this role our salary range is $111,000 to  $144,000, depending on relevant experience.
Additional compensation details: 
Equity: $25,000 in RSUs.
#LI-AZ1How we reward Evolvers
Evolvers have access to highly competitive benefits and rewards that support their whole well-being so they can focus on bringing their best selves to work. 
Financial

Industry competitive pay, including equity in the company for all Evolvers
401(k) with a 4% match that vests immediately

Family

6 weeks of paid parental leave for birth and non-birth parents
Infertility coverage
Child care discounts and locator support 
Pet insurance to cover your furry children

Well-being

Comprehensive health plans that include a 100% employer paid option for you and your family
100% employer-paid dental and vision for you and your family
8 free mental health visits

Unplug and Explore

Take some time away from work with generous PTO, sick, holidays, and a personal holiday to celebrate what’s more important to YOU
Annual Evolve travel credit after 1 year
Discounts to stay at Evolve properties

Learn Every Day

World class onboarding programs
Learning and development opportunities

How we work together
With our core values as our guide, every Evolver helps shape the company we want to work for and the people we want to be. We’ve cultivated a culture of collaboration, care, and responsibility that we can all be proud of, and we’re excited to see what you’ll bring as your authentic self.
Still curious about who we are and what we do? Read more about our business and our culture at evolve.com.
EEO 
At Evolve, we are committed to diversity and inclusion. As an equal opportunity employer, all qualified candidates will be considered for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, age, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), gender identity or gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, military service or veteran status, physical or mental disability, or any other legally protected characteristic. Evolve participates in e-Verify for all positions.
If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation at any point in the hiring process, please let your recruiter know.
